update `CBIF`
CBIF02 = #{cbif02,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF03 = #{cbif03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBIF04 = #{cbif04,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF05 = #{cbif05,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CBIF06 = #{cbif06,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF07 = #{cbif07,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF08 = #{cbif08,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF09 = #{cbif09,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF10 = #{cbif10,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF11 = #{cbif11,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF12 = #{cbif12,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
CBIF13 = #{cbif13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CBIE01 = #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CBIF14 = #{cbif14,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where CBIF01 = #{cbif01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update `CBIF` set CBIF02 = #{cbif02,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF03 = #{cbif03,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIF04 = #{cbif04,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF05 = #{cbif05,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CBIF06 = #{cbif06,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF07 = #{cbif07,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF08 = #{cbif08,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF09 = #{cbif09,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF10 = #{cbif10,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF11 = #{cbif11,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF12 = #{cbif12,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CBIF13 = #{cbif13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CBIE01 = #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CBIF14 = #{cbif14,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CBIF01 = #{cbif01,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.CBIE07,a.CBIE02,b.CBWA09,c.CALA08,d.CBSA08,g.CBPA07,h.CALA08,f.CBPB12, f.CBPB15,f.CBPB08,e.CBIF13,a.CBIE01,e.CBIF09,e.CBIF11,e.CBIF12 FROM CBIE a LEFT JOIN CBWA b on b.CBWA01=a.CBIE09 LEFT JOIN CALA c on c.CALA01=a.CBIE16 LEFT JOIN CBIF e on e.CBIE01=a.CBIE01 LEFT JOIN CBSA d on d.CBSA01=e.CBIF14 LEFT JOIN CBPB f ON f.CBPB01=e.CBIF08 LEFT JOIN CBPA g on g.CBPA01=f.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA h on h.CALA01=f.CBPB10 where a.CBIE01= #{cbie01,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t.CBIB01, t.CBPB14,t.CBPB10,t.CBPB12,t.CBPB15,t.CBPB08,t.CBPB01,SUM(t.CBIB15) cbib15 from (SELECT ib.CBIB01, ib.CBIB02, ib.CBIB08, ib.CBIB15, pb.CBPB08, pb.CBPB15, pb.CBPB12, pb.CBPB10, pb.CBPB14, pb.CBPB01, wa.CBWA09 FROM CBIB ib LEFT JOIN CBPB pb ON pb.CBPB01 = ib.CBIB08 LEFT JOIN CBWA wa ON wa.CBWA01 = ib.CBIB02 WHERE ib.CBIB01 IN ( SELECT max( tb.CBIB01 ) FROM CBIB tb GROUP BY tb.CBIB08, tb.CBIB02 ) order by ib.CBIB04 desc) t
GROUP BY t.CBIB08 HAVING SUM(t.CBIB15) !=0 and SUM(t.CBIB15) is not null and t.CBPB14 = #{classId} and t.CBPB10 = #{cbpb10} and t.CBPB01 = #{cbpb01}

select a.CBOA01,a.CBOA07,b.CBCA08,a.CBOA25,d.CBPA07,f.CALA08,c.CBPB12,g.lock_qty as lockQty, e.CBOB09,e.CBOB10,e.CBOB15,c.CBPB01,e.cbob01 from CBOA a LEFT JOIN CBCA b ON b.CBCA01=a.CBOA09 LEFT JOIN CBOB e ON e.CBOA01=a.CBOA01 LEFT JOIN CBPB c ON c.CBPB01=e.CBOB08 LEFT JOIN CBPA d ON d.CBPA01=c.CBPB14 LEFT JOIN CALA f ON f.CALA01=c.CBPB10 LEFT JOIN gs_goods_use g ON g.order_no=a.CBOA07 and e.CBOB08 = g.goods_id where a.CBOA06=0
and d.CBPA07 like concat('%', #{cbpa07}, '%')
and f.cala08 like concat('%', #{cala08}, '%')
and c.CBPB01=#{cbpb01}
order by a.CBOA02 desc

SELECT a.CBBA07,c.CALA08,b.CBPB12,b.CBPB08,a.CBBA09,a.CBBA11,a.CBBA14,a.CBBA13,a.CBBA12, (a.CBBA11+a.CBBA13) as producedNum,(a.CBBA09-a.CBBA11-a.CBBA13) as stockoutNum FROM CBBA a LEFT JOIN CBPB b ON a.CBBA08=b.CBPB01 LEFT JOIN CALA c ON c.CALA01=b.CBPB10 where a.CBBA06=0
and a.CBBA07 like concat('%', #{cbba07}, '%')
and a.CBBA12 like concat('%', #{cbba12}, '%')
and b.cbpb01=#{cbpb01}
order by a.CBBA02 desc
